name: WhiteHoleAR
description:
This is the first version the game. To play it you need to have a marker. You can either print it or display on the monitor. After that point the camera your phone on marker and fly in white hole!

Link to view and download marker: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IiFgv8eXixtaYYh5eZtQm6eY-xqq7PIR/view?usp=shari...

Don't twist your phone, here gyro sensor doesn't work! Only move phone in parallel marker.
Pick up red and blue objects so to high health and to decrease speed in the game ;)
